title: What really happened between Jim Bent and Jeffree Star? Controversy explored after viral claims resurface during Beast Games run
summary_full: Jim Bent’s strong run on Beast Games Season 2 brought renewed attention to old rumors linking him to Jeffree Star. Bent denied any relationship, calling it a past friendship. Star pushed back publicly, saying otherwise. Their exchange went viral, pulling the show into online debate while Bent continues competing for the $5 million prize.
summary_public: Jim Bent’s strong run on Beast Games Season 2 brought renewed attention to old rumors linking him to Jeffree Star. Bent denied any relationship, calling it a past friendship. Star pushed back publicly, saying otherwise.…
